title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using the new class wizard in Build 20011106, the context for nested classes is not set correctly.
EB: When a .java file is open in the editor, clicking the new class button should default the 'Enclosing Type' field to the current type in the editor. However, it is currently blank.
SR: To reproduce this issue:  1. Open a .java file in the editor.  2. Click on the new class button.  3. Check the 'Enclosing Type' field in the new class wizard.
